text: N’abemera Imana yabo y’ukuri mubagabo no mubakenyezi nibo bagenzi kubandi, kuko bategeka ibintu vyiza hamwe n’ugutuza amabi ayariyo yose, nuguhagarika amasengesho hamwe n’ugutanga imperezwa bakagamburukira Imana hamwe n’intumwa yayo, abo nibo Imana izogirira impuhwe zayo, mu vy’ukuri Imana niyo ifise ububasha n’ubuhizi buhagije
